ing: 1 (2.5 ounce) package smoked sliced beef, chopped
des: "This is a cheese ball that is great for an appetizer at a party.  You can dress is up with nuts on the outside or a little extra hot pepper sauce for that extra zing!!"
ins: Combine cream cheese, beef, onions and pepper sauce with hands or an electric mixer.  Shape into a ball.  Chill at least 1 hour before serving with crackers.
